entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 23 April 2023
